CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 机会；可能性；偶然；偶然性；运气；几率；意外；风险；冒险；时机；巧合；碰巧；机缘；机遇；（抽彩售货或抽彩给奖中的）彩票；奖券
偶然的；意外的；碰巧的；随机的；未预见的；无计划的
冒险；拿…去冒风险；偶然发现；偶然发生；碰巧；碰运气；侥幸尝试；对…的后果听其自然

synonym.mean: 机会，际遇；运气，侥幸；可能性

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 不确实的；偶然发生的；不安的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指不顾个人安危去干某事，侧重主动承担风险。
主要指冒险作出某个选择，隐含碰运气意味。
指冒风险试一试，或指有礼貌的反抗或反对。
可与venture换用，但语气较强，着重挑战或违抗。
多指通过人为安排的发生。
侧重事前无安排或无准备而发生的事，特指巧合。
普通用词，泛指一切客观事物或情况的发生，强调动作的偶然性。
较正式用词，可指意外地发生，也可指意料中的发生。

word_group.brief_definition: 抓住机会；把握机会；冒险碰运气
(尤用于问句, 询问是否真实、可能等)或许, 可能
冒险一试, 碰碰运气
成功固然好, 只惜良机少；苦于没有机会
word_group.phrase: chance would be a fine thing

bilingual.source: They have a good chance of winning.
bilingual.target: 他们有很大的获胜机会。

bilingual.source: Petey needled me every chance he got.
bilingual.target: 皮蒂一有机会就嘲笑我。

bilingual.source: Yes, the team has a good chance this year.
bilingual.target: 是的，今年队伍有很大机会。

bilingual.source: Make sure all pupils have a chance to speak.
bilingual.target: 确保所有学生都有机会发言。

bilingual.source: That means we have a better chance of winning.
bilingual.target: 这意味着我们有更好的获胜机会。

bilingual.source: Now we have another chance to look up at the stars.
bilingual.target: 现在我们有机会再次仰望星空。

bilingual.source: We have never been given the chance to talk to him.
bilingual.target: 我们从未得到与他说话的机会。

bilingual.source: Only then will I have a chance to achieve my dream.
bilingual.target: 只有这样我才有机会实现我的梦想。

bilingual.source: Visitors will have a chance to see beautiful works of art.
bilingual.target: 游客将有机会看到美丽的艺术作品。

list.abstract: 青春励志类日剧，讲述了以法医学为背景，5名研究生在相互协助下解开尸体谜团的故事，其中还伴随着几人之间的友情物语以及对生命的思考。
chance是成都随行科技于2013年10月推出的一款移动社交平台。 chance具有眼前功能、附近功能、相遇记录、With、甩一甩、chance帮帮、零流量分享视频等服务。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a chance. I'll take that chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这也是机会。我会冒险抓住这个机会。

yingyinNormal.en: But maybe now, we have a real chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许现在真有机会。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe he didn't give you a chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许他没有给你机会说。

yingyinNormal.en: You're, you're my last chance. Please!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是我最后的机会，求你了！

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, big boss. This is our chance. Yes. Ha.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿，有老大，我们机会来了。对。哈。

yingyinNormal.en: Nobody knows we're alive. This is our chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没人知道我们还活着，这正是咱们的机会。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, thanks, Cary. Alicia, this is your chance. Take it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，谢谢，凯里。艾丽西娅，机会难得别错过。

yingyinNormal.en: Look around. There's no chance we haven't been recognized already.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看看周围，没机会了，我们早已被认出来了。

yingyinNormal.en: Not like this one. You haven't got a chance, not a chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不像这样。你没机会了，没机会了。

yingyinNormal.en: He has a 15% chance. That's what the doctor said. That's not a real chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他有15%的机会。那医生说的那不算真正的机会。

yingyinNormal.en: You have skills you've never had the chance to use and I can give you that chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你身怀绝技，却没机会施展，我能给你机会。

yingyinNormal.en: Jack, listen to me. Now, we've got a chance. We've nearly missed it, but we've got our chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰克，听我说，现在我们有一次机会，虽然差点错过，但我们现在有机会了。

yingyinNormal.en: All the middle class in this country want is a chance. No guarantee, just a chance. Americans want to work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 全美的中产阶级需要的就是这样的机会。不是毫无意义的保证，而是切切实实的机会。

yingyinNormal.en: You're not giving it a chance. You're not giving me a chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许吧，但是你连尝试都不愿意，你都不愿意给我机会试一试。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, Luisa. You have a chance to be the bigger person here. Take it. No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 此时你有机会成为大人物，把握机会吧。不。

yingyinNormal.en: Today, it's given us something. It has given us a chance. To do what?
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天人生给了我们一样东西，它给我们机会。什么机会？

yingyinNormal.en: I should've taken care of her when I had the chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当初有机会时，我就该解决了她。

yingyinNormal.en: He's still got a chance for the part? Oh, that's great news.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他还有机会？真是太好了。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, I hardly ever get a chance to play anymore.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别这样，我几乎都没什么机会玩了。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, you've got one more chance, and that'll be your last.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我再给你一次机会，也是最后一次。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 抓住机会；把握机会；冒险碰运气

examination_example.sentence: The big companies use such deals to buy their most threatening potential competitors before their businesses have a <highlight>chance</highlight> to gain momentum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些大公司利用这样的交易，在最具威胁性的潜在竞争对手有机会形成势头之前将其买下来。

examination_example.sentence: Then the kids were handed chocolate coins, and given a <highlight>chance</highlight> to share them with an anonymous child.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，孩子们得到了金币巧克力，并有机会与一个匿名的孩子分享。

examination_example.sentence: Only Ukip, sensing its <highlight>chance</highlight>, has sided with those pleading for a more considered approach to using green land.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只有英国独立党意识到了这个机会，他们和恳请采用更为谨慎的方法使用绿地的人们站在了一边。

sense_info_list.en: a possibility of something happening, especially something that you want

examination_example.sentence: High growth rates increased the <highlight>chances</highlight> for academic innovation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 高增长率增加了学术创新的可能性。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Chances</highlight> are, your headshots are seen much more often now than a decade or two ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，你的头像很可能比一二十年前更常被看到。

examination_example.sentence: We have an excellent <highlight>chance</highlight> of surviving for tens, if not hundreds, of thousands of years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们即使存活不了几十万年，也很有可能存活几万年。

sense_info_list.en: the way that some things happen without any cause that you can see or understand

examination_example.sentence: It is not by <highlight>chance</highlight> that the Funeral March is not the last movement of the Eroica Symphony.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《葬礼进行曲》不是《英雄交响曲》的最后乐章，这并非偶然。

examination_example.sentence: They aren't interested in taking any <highlight>chances</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们对冒险不感兴趣。

word_usage.usage: have a chance to do sth.和have a chance of doing sth.都可以用来表示“（做）某事的机会或可能性”，但两者侧重点不同，前者侧重“去做某事的机会”，可能还没做，后者表示“有机会做着某事”，侧重一种状态。
chance也可以作动词表示“冒险”，如：She was chancing her luck driving without a licence. 她无照驾车，完全是在冒险。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: He gave subjects a <highlight>chance</highlight> to deceive for monetary gain while examining their brains in a functional MRI machine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他给研究对象一个通过欺骗获得金钱的机会，同时，在一个功能强大的磁共振机器上检查他们的大脑。

examination_example.sentence: The Cascadia Rising drill gives area residents and emergency responders a <highlight>chance</highlight> to practice what to do in case of a 9.0-magmitude earthquake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 卡斯卡迪亚上升演习给了当地居民和紧急救援人员提供了一个机会练习在发生9.0级地震时该怎么做。

examination_example.sentence: The Cascadia Rising drill gives area residents and emergency responders a <highlight>chance</highlight> to practice what to do in case of a 9.0-magnitude earthquake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 卡斯卡迪亚地区上升演习使该地区的居民和紧急救援人员有机会练习9.0级地震时的处理方法。

examination_example.sentence: With so much stuff in space, and a limited area around our planet, the government wants to reduce the <highlight>chances</highlight> of a collision.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于太空中有太多东西，而且我们星球周围的区域有限，政府希望减少发生碰撞的机会。

sense_info_list.en: a possibility of something happening, especially something that you want

examination_example.sentence: Your <highlight>chances</highlight> of being more carefully considered for the job can quickly go downhill by saying the wrong thing at the wrong time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你在错误的时间说了错误的话，雇主认真考虑你获得这个工作的可能性就会迅速降低。

examination_example.sentence: Repetition of bad ideas increases their <highlight>chances</highlight> of being accepted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重复坏主意会增加他们被接受的机会。

examination_example.sentence: There is always the <highlight>chance</highlight> that it could affect my reputation and my ability to network in the industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它总是有可能影响我的声誉和我在该行业的人脉能力。

sense_info_list.en: the way that some things happen without any cause that you can see or understand

word_usage.usage:
“作某事的机会”用chance to do sth.或chance of doing sth.表达。
示例：Please give me a chance to explain.
请给我一个解释的机会。

作“做某事对某人来说是一次机会”用chance for sb. to do sth.表达。
示例：It's a good chance for you to meet. 
这是你们见面的好机会。

“作某事的可能性”，多用chance of+(动)名词或由that引导的同位语从句表达。
示例：(1) He has a good chance of winning.
他很有希望获胜。
(2) There is still chance that you will pass the exam.
你考试及格还是有希望的。
take a chance表示“冒险”，而不是“获得机会”；by chance表示“意外, 偶然”。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重事前无安排或无准备而发生的事, 特指巧合。
普通用词, 泛指一切客观事物或情况的发生, 强调动作的偶然性。是常用词, 指偶然或按计划的发生。如：When did the explosion happen?(爆炸什么时候发生？)
较正式用词, 可指意外地发生, 也可指意料中的发生。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: In American history, immigrants used to have a good <highlight>chance</highlight> to move upward in society.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国历史上，移民过去曾有很好的社会晋升机会。

examination_example.sentence: So his classmates decided to give him another <highlight>chance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以他的同学们决定给他第二次机会。

examination_example.sentence: What they believe is that their children must excel and beat their white peers in academic settings so they have the same <highlight>chances</highlight> to excel later.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们认为，自己的孩子必须在学习上超越那些白人孩子，比他们更优秀，这样他们以后才能有同样的机会脱颖而出。

sense_info_list.en: a possibility of something happening; especially something that you want

examination_example.sentence: And <highlight>chances</highlight> were, in the images, Asian Americans appeared in stereotypical (模式化的) roles, such as engineers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 并且很有可能，在图像中，亚裔美国人以模式化角色出现，例如工程师。

examination_example.sentence: There's a Coast Guard building and a tall trade tower, as well as a park, golf course and university. <highlight>Chances</highlight> are you've actually seen this place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 城内有一幢海岸警卫楼，一座高耸的贸易大厦，还有一片公园，一个高尔夫球场以及一所大学。实际上你可能见过这个地方。

examination_example.sentence: In the rare <highlight>chance</highlight> that there is a micro-organism that can make you sick on the exact spot where the food dropped.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在极少数情况下，在食物掉落的确切位置上有一种能让你生病的微生物。

sense_info_list.en: the way that some things happen without any cause that you can see or understand

examination_example.sentence: To make sure this wasn't by <highlight>chance</highlight>, Wang conducted additional tests using different performance measures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了确保这不是偶然，王教授用不同的衡量方法进行了额外的测试。

word_usage.usage:
“作某事的机会”用chance to do sth.或chance of doing sth.表达。
示例：Please give me a chance to explain.
请给我一个解释的机会。

“作某事的可能性”，多用chance of+(动)名词或由that引导的同位语从句表达。
示例：(1) He has a good chance of winning.
他很有希望获胜。
(2) There is still chance that you will pass the exam.
你考试及格还是有希望的。
take a chance表示“冒险”，而不是“获得机会”；by chance表示“意外, 偶然”。

作“做某事对某人来说是一次机会”用chance for sb. to do sth.表达。
示例：It's a good chance for you to meet. 
这是你们见面的好机会。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 可与 venture 换用，但语气较强，着重挑战或违抗。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Everyone has a <highlight>chance</highlight> to succeed in their pursuit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都有机会在追求中获得成功。

examination_example.sentence: Kids with preference for the arts have a greater <highlight>chance</highlight> of finding employment in the future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 偏爱艺术的孩子在未来更有可能找到工作。

examination_example.sentence: It was a good <highlight>chance</highlight> to practice my Spanish.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是练习西班牙语的好机会。

examination_example.sentence: The dogs were able to pick the angry or happy face more often than one would expect by random <highlight>chance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 狗能够更频繁地识别生气或开心的面孔，这比人们预料的可能性要多。

examination_example.sentence: What are your <highlight>chances</highlight> of getting the job?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你得到这份工作的可能性有多大？

examination_example.sentence: But one day I <highlight>chanced</highlight> to show up for an after-school meeting of the Science Olympiad team.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但有一天，我碰巧参加了科学奥林匹克竞赛队的课后会议。

examination_example.sentence: Teresa posted a photo of the <highlight>chance</highlight> meeting on a social networking website accompanied by the touching words.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 特蕾莎在社交网站上发布了这次偶遇的照片，并配以感人的文字。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 偏重偶然的，无法推测的因素。
常含有变幻无常和人力无法变更的意思。
可指好运气，也可指坏运气，但在没有任何修饰语时，一般指好运气。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It's also a good <highlight>chance</highlight> to know about the society.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这也是一个了解社会的好机会。

examination_example.sentence: It's another <highlight>chance</highlight> to remember this great writer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是纪念这位伟大作家的另一个机会。

examination_example.sentence: It's my great honor to have a <highlight>chance</highlight> to make a speech here.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很荣幸有机会在这里发表演讲。

sense_info_list.en: a possibility of something happening, especially something that you want

examination_example.sentence: The tiny and dangerous things from the smoke easily get into people's body and the <highlight>chances</highlight> of being sick increase.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 烟雾中微小而危险的物质很容易进入人体，患病的可能性增加。

examination_example.sentence: A smoke alarm greatly reduces your <highlight>chances</highlight> of being hurt in a fire.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 烟雾报警器大大降低了你在火灾中受伤的几率。

examination_example.sentence: If we save one second, the patient may have a better <highlight>chance</highlight> to live.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们节省一秒钟，病人可能有更大的生存机率。

sense_info_list.en: the way that some things happen without any cause that you can see or understand

word_usage.usage:
“作某事的机会”用chance to do sth.或chance of doing sth.表达。
示例：Please give me a chance to explain.
请给我一个解释的机会。

作“做某事对某人来说是一次机会”用chance for sb. to do sth.表达。
示例：It's a good chance for you to meet. 
这是你们见面的好机会。

“作某事的可能性”，多用chance of+(动)名词或由that引导的同位语从句表达。
示例：(1) He has a good chance of winning.
他很有希望获胜。
(2) There is still chance that you will pass the exam.
你考试及格还是有希望的。
take a chance表示“冒险”，而不是“获得机会”；by chance表示“意外, 偶然”。
